code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{Home,Grid,ShoppingCart,Package,User}from'lucide-react';import{useCartStore}from'../store';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BottomNav=()=>{const location=useLocation();const cartItems=useCartStore(state=>state.items);const cartCount=cartItems.reduce((sum,item)=>sum+item.quantity,0);const isActive=path=>location.pathname===path;const navItems=[{icon:Home,label:'Home',path:'/'},{icon:Grid,label:'Categories',path:'/categories'},{icon:ShoppingCart,label:'Cart',path:'/cart',badge:cartCount},{icon:Package,label:'Orders',path:'/orders'},{icon:User,label:'Profile',path:'/profile'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"sticky-bottom-nav bg-white border-t border-gray-200 shadow-2xl",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-around items-center h-20",children:navItems.map(item=>{const Icon=item.icon;const active=isActive(item.path);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:item.path,className:"flex flex-col items-center justify-center w-1/5 h-full transition-colors duration-200 ".concat(active?'text-green-500':'text-gray-600 hover:text-green-500'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{size:24}),item.badge>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"absolute -top-2 -right-2 bg-red-500 text-white text-xs rounded-full w-5 h-5 flex items-center justify-center font-bold animate-pulse",children:item.badge>99?'99+':item.badge})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-xs mt-1 font-medium",children:item.label})]},item.path);})})});};export default BottomNav;
